52720.「やりましたね！ <pc>さん！\n ついに 飾りつけが終わりました！\n こん:
You did it! <pc>! We finally finished
decorating! I've never seen such a beautiful
tree of stars before!

52721.「いよいよ 白銀の星夜祭の始まりです！\n さあ 一緒に 声を合わせて\n 盛大:
The Silver Star Festival is about to begin!
Let's join our voices together to welcome the
Holy Messenger in a grand way!

52722.「星よ！ 雪よ！ 我らを けがれのない\n 白銀の世界に いざないたまえ！:
Stars! O snow! O let us be brought to a world
of pure white!

52724.「いよう お前ら。今年１年 いい子にしてたか？\n こんな豪勢に 星の大樹を飾り:
Let's go, boys. Have you been good this year?
You've got some chutzpah to decorate a big
starry tree like this!

52725.「キャーッ！ テンチョー！\n 今年も会えるの 楽しみにしてましたー！:
C'mon! Tencho! I've been looking forward to
seeing you again this year!

52726.「その呼び方は やめろっつーの！\n オレは テンチョーじゃねえ！: Don't call me that! I'm not Tencho!

52727.「……ったく あのヤロー。\n 妖精たちに どういう教育してやがんだ？\n まあ:
What the heck is that guy doing? What kind of
training are you giving the fairies? Never
mind... I've got a present for you!

52728.「さっすが テンチョ……じゃなかった\n 聖天の使いさま 待ってましたー！:
I've been waiting for you, Holy
Messenger...not Tencho!

52729.「はっはっは。お前ら そう せっつくな。\n ちゃんと全員分あるから 順番に並べ:
Ha-ha-ha. Don't be so impatient. There's
enough for everyone. Line up in order, line up
in order.

52730.「素敵でしょう？ あれが 聖天の使いさま。\n ……ですが 私たちも\n あの方:
Isn't it nice? That is the Holy Messenger. But
we don't know much about him either.

52731.「何か 自分の使命を果たすために\n 光りかがやく 天の箱舟に乗って\n 遠い遠:
Something about traveling to distant worlds on
a glimmering Starflight Express to fulfill his
mission...

52732.「妖精の女王さまの 古い知り合いらしくて\n いつからか 私たちのために この星:
It seems that she is an old acquaintance of the Fairy Queen, who has been holding this Starry Night Festival for us for some time
now.

52733.「よお お前さん 旅人か？\n 飾りつけを手伝ってくれて ありがとな。\n 今年:
Hey there, you're a traveler? Thanks for
helping me with the decorations. This year was
the most spectacular one yet!

52734.「ホラよ。こいつは お前さんへのプレゼントだ。\n いい子にしてたヤツには みん:
There you go. This is a present for you. I've
been giving them out to all the good boys and
girls, so just take it already.

52735.「ふっ。お前さん いい目をしてやがるな。\n お前さんみたいな旅人が たくさんい:
Huh. You have good eyes. If there were many
travelers like you, Astoltia would be safe and
sound.

52736.「……さーて プレゼントも配りおわったし\n オレは そろそろ おいとまするぜ。:
Well, now that the presents have been handed
out, I'd better get going.

52737.「えっ！ テンチョ……じゃなかった\n 聖天の使いさま もう行っちゃうんですか？:
What! Tencho...I mean, Holy Messenger, are you
leaving already?

52738.「ああ。悪いが 今年は忙しくってな。\n ゆっくり 話してるわけにもいかねーんだ:
Oh, I'm sorry. Sorry, I've been busy this
year. I can't talk to you at leisure.

52739.「それじゃあな お前ら！\n 来年また ここで会おうぜ！:
See you next year, boys! See you back here
next year!

52740.「よぉーしっ！ 最後に\n とっておきのプレゼント いくぜええ！: All right! Here's one last present for you!

52742.「この光の粒には 星の加護が宿っていて\n 今年１年の けがれを消し去ってくれる:
These particles of light have the blessings of
the stars to erase the blemishes of the year!
That's how we can live every year in peace!

52743.「お前らに 星々の加護が あらんことをーーっ！\n 白銀の星夜祭 存分に楽しめよ:
May the stars bless you all! Enjoy the Silver
Star Festival to the fullest!

52744.「あーぁ 行っちゃいましたね。\n テンチョ……じゃなかった 聖天の使いさま。:
Ah, he's gone, isn't he? Tencho...no, Holy
Messenger.

52745.「<pc>さん。星の大樹の飾りつけ\n 手伝ってくれて ありがとうございました。:
<pc>. Thank you for helping me
decorate the Great Tree of Stars. It made for
a fabulous Silvery Starry Night!

52746.「それでは 私たちも\n 白銀の星夜祭の ハッピーな雰囲気を\n 思う存分 楽し:
Let's enjoy the happy atmosphere of the Silver
Star Festival to the fullest!
